name: THE PRELUDE
description:
What is THE PRELUDE?

An enemy hell bent on destroying you hunts you down as you attempt to get to the end goal and proceed onto the next stage. Will you be able to put your quick thinking and reaction time to the test to OUTSMART THE AI and defeat all 30 puzzling levels?  

With quick respawn mechanics, portals and funky doors - The Prelude will keep you on the edge of your seat until the very end with its rage inducing but satisfying gameplay.

An Extra Challenge

Once you've beaten the game once, you will then be able to access the EXTRAS MENU, where you will be faced with the ultimate challenge mode. Will you be able to beat the entire game with this challenge mode enabled or will it stop you in your tracks to prove your ultimate worth as a gamer?

ITS FREE?!

Yes, its free. I like making games that as many people can play as possible. If you want to support me, consider checking out my Patreon - more on that below.

Controls

The controls are as simple as ARROW KEYS/WASD and the SPACE BAR/ENTER KEY. Not accounting for things that aren't primary gameplay features.

Developer's Message

The Prelude is a fast paced puzzle game that will test your skills in both reaction time and quick thinking. Its a short and free game that I developed using Game Maker Studio 2 back in 2019 and have finally gotten around to polishing it up for a release in 2022! 

If you enjoyed the game, please consider supporting me on Patreon using the following link! I appreciate all donations no matter the sum and you can even get your name in the credits of my current project if you so desire! There is also behind-the-scenes content there as well.

Support me here through Patreon!

Via supporting me through Patreon, you help me to continue developing my games whilst also keeping them as affordable as possible - with the end goal being to be able to release all of my games for free whilst also supporting myself and the continued development of the games. 

Thank you all for supporting my games. Whether that be in a positive review and download or through Patreon, I appreciate every last one of you to the end.

Sincerely, DJJBolton.

"The Developer"
